home.DesignDescription: Design your own custom t-shirts with our easy-to-use design tool.
home.ContactDescription: We're here to help! If you have any questions or need support, feel free to reach out to us. Our team is ready to assist you and will respond to your inquiries as soon as possible.

about.description: With years of experience and deep industry knowledge, we have a proven track record of success and are constantly pushing ourselves to stay ahead of the curve.
about.evolutionProcedure: Our evolution procedure is super intelligent.
about.hireUs: Let's hire us to reach your objectives.

contactus.CONTACT_DESC: Our team is available to provide prompt and helpful responses to all inquiries. You can reach us via phone, email, or by filling out the contact form below.
contactus.GET_IN_TOUCH: Get in touch to buy your t-shirt
contactus.Contact_description: We're always on the lookout to work with new clients. If you're interested in working with us, please get in touch in one of the following ways.

design.title: Design Your Custom Shirt
design.description: Create a unique shirt with your own text, icons, and logos. Perfect for personal use or gifting!
design.deleteLogoDescription: Remove all logos and icons from the current view.
design.saveDesignDescription: Download your design as an image.
